Posts.Content: duchessoftea wrote: Hello Everyone, I was recently diagnosed with adrenal gland mets and have had difficulty finding anyone with this same mets? I know it is rare, but has anyone here had this or know of anyone who has had their BC mets here? I am ER/PR+ HER2- Thank you:) Michelle Dx 10/13/2016, IDC, Left, 3cm, Stage IIB, metastasized to other, Grade 3, 1/14 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 2/20/2017 Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Left, Right Chemotherapy AC + T (Taxol) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone diagnosed with adrenal gland mets? duchessoftea Stilts
